paragraph: Add email signup forms to your website to grow your own fan email list. Design, schedule and send newsletters..
Add a tour calendar to your website in a few clicks, or sync with Bandsintown. Give fans detailed event info and sharing links.
Easily share music, tour dates and content to your social platforms. Pull your socials onto your website in a few clicks.
Get your own custom .com domain name free for as long as you're a member.
Bandzoogle websites are built with search engine optimization features designed to help fans find your music..
Integrated reporting tools let you know who your customers are, where they come from, and what they're buying.
